import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { GlobalService } from 'src/app/services/global.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { projects :any; baseUrl = "http://localhost:3000/public/images/uploads/" constructor(private global:GlobalService){ this.global.getProjects().subscribe((res)=>{ this.projects = res.data } , ()=>{ }, ()=>{ } ) } deleteProject(i:any){ this.projects[i]._id this.global.deleteProject(this.projects[i]._id).subscribe((res)=>{ console.log(res); } , (err)=>{ console.log(err); } ) } }
